404

Oh no! Another case of link rot!

  • What does link rot mean?
    • When people try to access a certain link, it no longer points to the intended file, webpage or server.
  • Why does this happen?
    • Websites are configured at the URL level, so when webpages are moved, redirected, or reorganized, the addressed are not automatically updated. And so weâ€™re lead to an address where there is nothing.
